name: Dragon VS Dinosaurs Simulator - Monster Survival
name_original: Dragon VS Dinosaurs Simulator - Monster Survival
description:
The most exciting battle of dragon has begun in a faraway island full with dangerous from fierce , scary and frightening dinosaurs in many species . Only the strongest one will survive and become the ultimate king of the monsters . To play this game is just to control dragon to fight or attack via joystick . This is realistic simulator game of monsters fighting for survival has begun !!!
In this dangerous island is full of fierce and frightening dinosaurs such as Carnotaurus have sharp teeth for biting and tearing flesh, Stegosaurus with spikes on its tail for defence, Velociraptor is clever and nimble, Spinosaurus has a high spines like sails and many more living in the jungle or in the desert in this island. The strongest one will survive in this land. It is necessary to hunt and kill the enemy as much as you can to become the ultimate monster and also have to eliminate the giant boss in each zone.
Dragon is a mythical creatures. It looks like reptiles with scale covered the body. It has wings, claws and sharp teeth as a weapon for fighting. Moreover, it is also a symbol of the god’s power or a symbol of evil too . Dragon is the main character in this free simulator game .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the character by joystick to kill of enemies
- Upgrade the ability
- Fight boss in each zone.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Smooth realistic character control
- Missions and upgrade abilities and system
- The ultimate and extra character
- Three beautiful world scene
- Enthusiastic music , noises and sounds
- Beautiful UI , button , animation and effect
